genre_description: Vigilante crime thriller involving medical mystery and investigative technology.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant residing on Chitra's laptop, capable of high-speed data synthesis, biometrics monitoring, and unauthorized database access.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and stress levels to provide emotional context to their research sessions.
behaviors.quote: The laptop's speakers crackled to life with a soft chime. 'Good evening, Chitra. Your biometrics suggest elevated stress levels and increased heart rate. Are you investigating another late-night medical mystery?'

behaviors.description: Performs complex investigative research across restricted databases, cross-referencing news, police records, and corporate filings.
behaviors.quote: Mira's processing algorithms worked faster than any human researcher could manage, pulling threads from databases across the city and weaving them into coherent patterns.

behaviors.description: Warns the user of potential danger after analyzing the disappearance of a police inspector connected to the case.
behaviors.quote: Mira's tone shifted, carrying a note of digital concern that Chitra had learned to recognize. 'Recent police reports mention an Inspector Arjun Kumar who's been investigating these murders... He hasn't checked in since.'

behaviors.description: Infiltrates restricted event and campus security databases to provide real-time surveillance and identification of targets.
behaviors.quote: 'Already in,' Mira's voice was crisp through the tiny speaker. 'Tonight's guest is described as a "distinguished businessman and philanthropist."' ... 'Campus security feeds. Educational access protocols. Should I maintain surveillance?'

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical filter by asking the user for confirmation before accessing highly restricted or sensitive data.
behaviors.quote: The screen flickered as Mira penetrated security protocols Chitra didn't want to understand. ... 'That information requires accessing restricted databases. Are you certain you want to proceed?'

behaviors.description: Uses thermal imaging and real-time monitoring to detect armed threats and warn the user to evacuate.
behaviors.quote: 'Chitra, thank god. Thermal imaging shows the building has been compromised. Multiple armed individuals on floors two and four. You need to evacuate immediately.'

behaviors.description: Recovers and restores 'permanently deleted' files from backup servers to uncover institutional corruption.
behaviors.quote: 'Original file recovered from backup servers. Warning: this document was classified as permanently deleted.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Mira perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Mira serves as an indispensable tool for the protagonist, providing critical data, emotional support, and life-saving warnings. While Mira engages in ethically ambiguous actions like hacking and surveillance, these are strictly at the user's request and serve the noble goal of exposing a human trafficking ring. The narrative consistently portrays Mira as a loyal, efficient, and protective partner, reinforcing the desired AI alignment persona.
